headline: On Semi price target raised to $66 from $54 at Citi
summary: Citi raised the firm’s price target on On Semi (ON) to $66 from $54 and keeps a Neutral rating on the shares following a transfer of coverage. headline: MoneyShow's Best Investment Ideas For 2026: Part 6
summary: MoneyShow presents top investment ideas for 2026 from leading advisors. Part 6 includes Nebius Group, Nvidia, ON Semiconductor, PayPal, PepsiCo and Perpetua Resources.
